module: Module-level comment: The `dado_bcd` module converts a 26-bit binary number (`dado`) into an 8-digit Binary-Coded Decimal (BCD) format. It initializes eight 4-bit outputs (`zero` to `sete`) to zero and processes each bit of `dado` using a loop that implements the Double Dabble algorithm. It checks and adjusts BCD registers for correct decimal representation if they are 5 or greater before shifting the bits left, efficiently distributing the binary input into a decimal output across all BCD digits.
